positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain enrollment momentum through proactive guidance and clear next-step commitments
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of confident, solution-focused language that transforms student concerns into actionable steps
positive.explanation2: Effective demonstration of how program structure accommodates diverse student circumstances through examples

improvement.explanation: Enhanced techniques needed for converting positive signals into firm enrollment commitments with intake dates
improvement.explanation1: Stronger demonstration required of specific career advancement pathways with concrete examples
improvement.explanation2: More assertive presentation needed of alternative study options while maintaining enrollment momentum

conversations.title: Direct Timeline Communication
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: Yes, that one starts May the 5th. We're currently enrolling for that one at the moment
conversations.student_response: Yeah, essentially, so when would the next round starts?
conversations.consultant_adaptation: Many of our nursing students study between shifts. Our online platform lets you download materials for offline study
conversations.recommended_improvement: Should have immediately moved to secure commitment: 'Since we're currently enrolling, shall we secure your spot now for the May 5th intake?'

goal_setting.title: Direct Timeline Communication
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant provided clear timeline information but missed opportunity for immediate commitment
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed interest in specific intake dates
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant demonstrated program flexibility but didn't secure enrollment
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have used timeline clarity to secure immediate enrollment commitment for May intake
